```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
num1 <- 5
vNum1 <- c(2,5)
vNum2 <- c(2, num1)
```

```{r}
vNum1 <- c(-1,5)
vNum2 <- c(2,3)
vNum3 <- c(vNum1,vNum2)
vNum4 <- c(-1,5,2,3)
vNum5 <- c(c(-1,5),c(2,3))
```

```{r}
vNum1 <- c(-1,5)
vNum2 <- c(2,3)
vNum4 <- c() # 空向量
```
```{r}
vNum3 <- c(vNum2, vNum1)
vNum4 <- c(vNum4, vNum1) # 向量疊代 （recursive vector concatenate）
```
